Solutions for the exercises [[exercisesolution1"> === Getting the example implementation
Example code
Solutions for the exercises
The solutions for this version of the book are currently contained in the master branch as well as in a branch specific for the related Eclipse release. If a next edition of this book is published, the master branch will point to the latest solution but the release pointer branch will still be available.
If you have the Git tooling for Eclipse installed, you can clone the repository via menu:File[Import > Git > Projects from Git
. Select _URI_ in the next wizard page and press the _Next_ button. In the following wizard page enter git://github.com/vogella/eclipse4book.git in the first line of the dialog.
image::eclipse4bookgit10.png[Importing the Eclipse 4 sample solution via Git, Part 1,pdfwidth=60%]
Select all branches your are interested in for the example solutions to the exercises of this book.
image::eclipse4bookgit20.png[Importing the Eclipse 4 sample solution via Git, Part 2,pdfwidth=60%]
Continue the wizard. At some point, the wizard will prompt you to import the project from your local clone.
image::eclipse4bookgit30.png[Importing the Eclipse 4 sample solution via Git, Part 3,pdfwidth=60%]
